title: "How can understanding time be the key to success and happiness in all aspects of life?"
first_phrase: In the previous text, the author emphasized the importance of purposeful action in achieving success and happiness. The universe responds to our interaction with it, and with the right posture and attitude, we can extract positive results, especially with regards to time management. In the final 200 tokens, the author introduces a clear process for realizing our desires and explains how a tiny elite of successful individuals have mastered this process, while most people fail to understand it. The author highlights the importance of understanding time as a capital asset in achieving practical actualization and success, and offers valuable insights for readers to put into practice.
content: One of the dimensions in respect of which our attitude matters is the temporal dimension, the one which relates to time. Time is a dimension in physics, and it is so in human life as well. It is an omnipresent factor, which everyone possesses but only few understand. It is, moreover, the first capital asset which any individual owns. It is the true mystery one has to pierce in order to understand how we should guide our vital force during the process of practical actualization. It is the secret lever for attaining whatever we desire. Every person is endowed with the same measure of this capital asset, though only a tiny elite of men is capable of exploiting it fruitfully. A clear-cut process to reach that goal exists. Whoever is successful, whoever achieves gratification in life, has understood it, possibly on an unconscious basis, and consequently develops his talents in conformity with that process. As for the one who fails to comprehend it, he will always remain unhappy. If we manage to understand this key, however, success will be shown to be far easier than what several people believe.
last_phrase: Understanding the value of time and utilizing it effectively is the key to achieving success and fulfillment in life. It is a universal asset, and everyone has the same measure of it. By grasping this concept, we can unlock the secret lever to attain whatever we desire and live a fulfilling life with comfort and material benefits.
